metadata.title: CVE-2024-27067 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:xen/evtchn: avoid WARN() when unbinding an event channel When unbinding auser event channel, the related handler might be called a last time in casethe kernel was built with CONFIG_DEBUG_SHIRQ. This might cause a WARN() inthe handler. Avoid that by adding an "unbinding" flag to struct user_eventwhich will short circuit the handler.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
